item.title: Comment on How democratic are the French results? by RobP
item.description:
If by "democratic" you mean proportional, obviously not very. If by democratic you mean the product of a historical quasi-consensual system (like sets v games in determining who wins a tennis match) not too shabby.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/07/how-democratic-are-the-french-results.html?commentID=160778852

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/07/how-democratic-are-the-french-results.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=how-democratic-are-the-french-results
